messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Thank you...re: intro and ?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/19/05 10:34:24 AM, deece@cutey.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/19/05 10:34:24 AM, deece@... writes:

<< Sorry for the generic post to everyone who responded to my question. I

don't have time to reply individually. >>

Don't apologize! That's a MUCH better use of a big list like this. And as
we're trying to discuss the issues and not the individuals, it's best to batch
the ideas, synthesize them into one response and reply to the group as a
whole.

Sandra

messages.subject: Thank you...re: intro and ?
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry for the generic post to everyone who responded to my question.  I don t have time to reply individually. I do appreciate all the replys and I am more
messages.messageBody:
Sorry for the generic post to everyone who responded to my question. I
don't have time to reply individually.
I do appreciate all the replys and I am more comfortable with where we
are at.
I did talk to my ds and asked him what he thought. He said he is not
sure that he is ready to go alone.
I know we have had registered sex offenders living within a few blocks
of us, but I don't know currently (I need to look this up).
I am really learning a lot from this group. Thank you so much!
I am also trying to save up some money for the Live and Learn
conference. I think it would be great for us to attend. We will see.
Thanks, again.
Deece
